mdx.rawBody:
---
Song: veLLi nilA
Film: amudha gAnam
---
Notes: s g2 m1 p n2 S

veLLi nilA    padhumai
s  sn.sn.n.p. s n. s

kAdhal paLLi..yi..lE   iLamai
p.n.   s  sn. sn. n.p. sn. s

idhu poomEdayO isai nAn pAdavO
sn.  s  pmm p  sn.  s   pmm mp

malai thEn mazhaiyO madhuvO
s g   m    mgmg  gs m g  gm

Stanza 1:
nAn soodum   sandhana    malligayO (2)
gp  pm(mpn)p g  sg n.sn. n.sg mpmp

poo mEni manmadhan bhoobALamO
gm  mgm  g  n. s   sm  mgpmmg

thAmaraipoovin oorvalamE (2)
gm p n  n  n   nS n p pmg

amudha gAnamE ho ho
pg g   m s sg pm mg

idhazhOdu pAdavO ahh hA
gm  p  g  m s sg pm  mg

en thiruvizhAvin thEril Adum kiLiyE
gm p  g g m  s   g  n.  sp.  n.m.p.n.

Stanza 2: (notes similar to Stanza 1)
kaNdAlE koNdAdum dEvadhai nAn (2)
kaNNAlE sugarAgam nAn pAdavA
Adayil moodiya thEn nilavE (2)
aNaithu pEsavO ah ah ah
nAn madiyil sAyAvO ah ah
vizhi konjum vELai andhi mAlai varumO
